page.title: 08A CHARD GIRL'S DAY
page.content:
{SATURDAY. On Saturday I get up at half past 7. We go to Taunton or Yeovil and buy some clothes for myself. When I come back I watch the television,I watch a programme called No 73 and some of Grandstand.Or listen to my WHAM! tape. I have a quick snack then go to the market and have a look around. Then I go home and go for a bike-ride around the lanes. At night we go to the local pub for some tea,I usually have chicken salad We have a drink and I have a go on the fruit machine.We go home at about half past ten.I watch a bit more television then I go to bed.
.
